about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: PEYJOOYAN
about.text1: What sets us apart (main pillars of activity): Complete production chain: Our expertise starts from the precise exploration of metal deposits and continues to safe extraction and intelligent processing, including the production of high-purity 18% copper concentrate. We take responsibility for the entire process.
about.text2: Quality and standards: Each of our products is the result of applying the latest geological technologies and a commitment to the strictest quality standards, which guarantees the sustainability of your industrial production.
about.text3: Commitment to sustainability: We believe that industrial development must go hand in hand with environmental protection. Our activities are designed with a sustainable approach to leave a valuable and healthy legacy for future generations.
about.text4: Commitment to sustainability: We believe that industrial development must go hand in hand with environmental protection. Our activities are designed with a sustainable approach to leave a valuable and healthy legacy for future generations.
about.text5: Commitment to sustainability: We believe that industrial development must go hand in hand with environmental protection. Our activities are designed with a sustainable approach to leave a valuable and healthy legacy for future generations.

mines.title: MINES
mines.subtitle: PEYJOOYAN
mines.text1: The polymetallic area is located in Qazvin province, about 27 km southwest of the city of Boyin Zahra, with an area of ​​11 km2. This area is part of the Central Iran structural zone and the Urmia magmatic belt.
mines.text3: Mineralization type: Polymetallic lead, zinc, gold, silver, copper
mines.text4: Ores parageneses: Galena, sphalerite, chalcopyrite, chalcocite, pyrite, malachite, lead and zinc oxide
mines.text5: Gange type: Silica, barite, iron oxides and hydroxides
mines.text6: Geochemical parageneses: Zn, Pb, Mo, Cu, Sb, As, Ag, Auinc, gold, silver, copper
mines.text7: Ores parageneses: Galena, sphalerite, chalcopyrite, chalcocite, pyrite, malachite, lead and zinc oxide
mines.text8: Gange type: Silica, barite, iron oxides and hydroxides
mines.text9: Geochemical parageneses: Zn, Pb, Mo, Cu, Sb, As, Ag, Au
mines.text10: Geochemical parageneses: Zn, Pb, Mo, Cu, Sb, As, Ag, Auinc, gold, silver, copper
mines.text11: Ores parageneses: Galena, sphalerite, chalcopyrite, chalcocite, pyrite, malachite, lead and zinc oxide
mines.text12: Gange type: Silica, barite, iron oxides and hydroxides
mines.text13: Geochemical parageneses: Zn, Pb, Mo, Cu, Sb, As, Ag, Au

minerals.rockText: THE MAXIMUM AND AVERAGE LEAD ELEMENT GRADES ARE 9.7 AND 2.2 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY.

ceo.title: CEO
ceo.subtitle: SOROUSH POURSALEH
ceo.text1: Mr. Poursaleh, one of the most prominent and influential figures in the history of Iran’s mining industry, dedicated his life to the development of the country’s underground resources. Born in 1961, he entered the field of entrepreneurship with a bold vision.
ceo.text2: With a deep understanding of the enormous potential of domestic reserves, he founded the Yazd Peijoyan Mining Company in 2017. His goal went beyond mere extraction; he sought to create a complete value chain, from exploration to final processing.
ceo.text3: Mr. Poursaleh’s most important achievement was the management and development of large mining projects, the most notable of which was the activation of the large [fictitious mine name] mine, which became one of the production hubs of [metal name] in the region. The advanced industrial infrastructure and factories that he established not only strengthened national production, but also provided extensive employment for residents of deprived areas.
ceo.text4: Mr. Poursaleh left  behind a valuable legacy with a committed approach to sustainable development and human resources. His memory as a pioneer and supporter of the country's mining development will forever remain in the industry.

founder.title: FOUNDER
founder.subtitle: DR ALI POURSALEH
founder.text1: Mr. Poursaleh, one of the most prominent and influential figures in the history of Iran’s mining industry, dedicated his life to the development of the country’s underground resources. Born in 1961, he entered the field of entrepreneurship with a bold vision.
founder.text2: With a deep understanding of the enormous potential of domestic reserves, he founded the Yazd Peijoyan Mining Company in 2017. His goal went beyond mere extraction; he sought to create a complete value chain, from exploration to final processing.
founder.text3: Mr. Poursaleh’s most important achievement was the management and development of large mining projects, the most notable of which was the activation of the large [fictitious mine name] mine, which became one of the production hubs of [metal name] in the region. The advanced industrial infrastructure and factories that he established not only strengthened national production, but also provided extensive employment for residents of deprived areas.
founder.text4: Mr. Poursaleh left behind a valuable legacy with a committed approach to sustainable development and human resources. His memory as a pioneer and supporter of the country's mining development will forever remain in the industry.
